titles.title: Depth of Mercy! Can There Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Depth of mercy! can there be Mercy still reserved for me? Can my God His wrath forbear-- Me, the chief of sinners spare?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I have long with stood His grace, Long provoked Him to His face, Would not hearken to His calls, Grieved Him by a thousand falls.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: There for me my Saviour stands, Holding forth His wounded hands; God is love! I know, I feel, Jesus weeps and loves me still. Amen.
